About Me

Hi! I am Omar Nyirurugo, a web designer/developer focused on crafting great web experiences. Designing and Coding have been my passion since the days I started working with computers but I found myself into web design/development. I enjoy creating beautifully designed, intuitive and functional websites.

) } export default About
